name: DEATHJOB
description:
The game takes place in a French dystopia where Valérie Giscard Destaing was re-elected president and managed to stay in power.

You play as an "employee" at the MANTIF, a French institute that makes horrible tests for no clear reasons.

Your objective is to complete the 6 rooms using your previous failures. You might even get a reward!

How to play ?

KEYBOARD

"Q or D" to move left and right

"E" to interract

"SPACE" to jump

"LEFT MOUSE" to pick up and realease cubes or bodies

"RIGHT MOUSE" to throw bodies

CONTROLLER

"L STICK" to move left and right

"X" to interract

"A" to jump

"LEFT TRIGGER" to pick up and realease cubes or bodies

"RIGHT TRIGGER" to throw bodies
